title: The friers chronicle: or, The true legend of priests and monkes liues
author: T. G., fl. 1623.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Budge: and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,
notes: Dedication signed: T.G., i.e. Thomas Gainsford? Thomas Goad?.
A variant of the edition with R. Mylbourne's name in the imprint.
Reported in STC, but not found in Folger catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
